greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle T(n,m) read by rows: T(n,m) = 2^min(m,n-m).
example: The triangle starts in row n=0 as:
mathematica: Clear[f, t]; f[n_, m_] = If[m <= Floor[n/2], m, n - m]; Table[Table[f[n, m], {m, 0, n}], {n, 0, 10}]; Flatten[%]
results.author: _Roger L. Bagula_ and _Gary W. Adamson_, Oct 09 2008
ext: Offset corrected by the Associate Editors of the OEIS, Sep 11 2009
